Hi Everyone

One of the things I like in KSP is designing and refining launch vehicle, opposed to designing payloads.

For 'missions' I've accumulated sattelited across multiple mods. 

However, I was wondering whether there was, or if someone would be interested in making (as I don't have the skills) to create a sattelite payload Mod which had different satts across the size ranges, from cube up to very large (requiring 5m or 7.5m vehicles). 

Or does this already exist? 

Thanks! 

 

R

Do you mean *one* part, complete pre-built sats, or sattelite parts packs?
Cuz there are many good ones out there, depending on what style/type you want, and how realistic.

First one I would recommend is Coatl ProbesPlus

As to one-piece, prebuilt, I wouldnt bet on it... having all the different functions you need, all on one part, can be very difficult to do in KSP.

Edited July 17, 2020 by Stone Blue

Hey - thanks for this, much appreciated!

Pre-built or at least craft files. But the more variety the better, too.

Essentially, in RL it's less common for launch providers to manufactur sattelites or payloads. And I enjoy launchers and spacecraft that get payloads to orbit.

I'll check out probes plus, thanks! R
